Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm drawing up a special menu for those
out scavenging for food or investigating.<sp:0:4:0>Ingredients are hard to come by in this
blizzard, but we'll be fine if we get a little
creative with our cooking.<sp:0:4:0>With the right ingredients, a little food
can go a long way.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>For example, a pinch of <clr:0000>spicy pepper<clr:ffff>
warms you up so you don't notice the
cold so much.<sp:0:4:0>We do not have many of them here, but
you are welcome to what's available.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>In tough situations like this, everyone
needs to look out for each other and
help where we can.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>I am so relieved that the blizzard stopped.
Thank you, Link, truly.<sp:0:4:0>Now everyone can return to their normal
lives back in the village.<sp:0:4:0>I plan to join them as soon as I have
finished straightening up in this lodge.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>When you cannot take any more of this
cold, I recommend snacking on food
made with a pinch of <clr:0000>spicy pepper<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>We do not have many here, but you are
welcome to what's available.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Once I finish tidying up around this lodge,
I shall rejoin the others in the village.<sp:0:4:0>I owe it to the children to cook their
favorite dishes. It is the least I can do
after all their help around the village.
